meta.title: Health Benefits - Yummi Nuts
meta.description: Discover the health benefits of our nutritious snacks. High in protein, fiber, and gluten-free options for a healthy lifestyle.

slider.title: Healthy Snacking
slider.description: Nutritious snacks for a balanced lifestyle

slider.title: Packed with Nutrition
slider.description: High protein, high fiber, gluten-free options

protein.title: High in Protein
protein.description: Our snacks are packed with plant-based proteins that help build and maintain muscle mass, providing sustained energy throughout your day.

fiber.title: Rich in Fiber
fiber.description: High fiber content promotes digestive health, helps maintain stable blood sugar levels, and keeps you feeling satisfied longer.

gluten_free.title: Gluten-Free Options
gluten_free.description: Perfect for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity, our gluten-free snacks don't compromise on taste or nutrition.

natural.title: Natural Ingredients
natural.description: Made with carefully selected natural ingredients, free from artificial preservatives and harmful additives.

antioxidants.title: Rich in Antioxidants
antioxidants.description: Packed with antioxidants that help fight free radicals and support your immune system for better overall health.

energy.title: Sustained Energy
energy.description: The perfect balance of nutrients provides long-lasting energy without the crash associated with sugary snacks.
